linear_range: A 3bet composition that targets dominated hands; often small sizing.
polar_range: A 3bet composition of strong values plus bluffs.
3bet_small: Small 3-bet sizing class (used for linear constructions).
3bet_big: Large 3-bet sizing class (used for polarized constructions and OOP seats).
RFI: Raise First In (open-raise when folded to).
limp: To call the big blind preflop (SB often uses limps for equity realization).
SPR: Stack-to-pot ratio. Low SPR increases incentive for polar sizing.
